title: Extermination Protocol
description: With their highway destroyed and engine ruined, the Vanguard is trapped in the Ruins District. It is time for a brutal counter-attack. The goal: destroy the Spawning Pits.

turns.narrative: You lead a strike team into the dark, fleshy depths of the Spawning Pits. Thousands of grubs line the walls, gestating.
turns.choice_a: Order the flamethrower units to burn everything
turns.consequence_a: The walls turn to ash. You breathe in toxic fumes, but the grubs are wiped out instantly.
turns.choice_b: Save the fuel and push straight for the Broodmother
turns.consequence_b: You save your fuel, but the grubs begin hatching behind you, cutting off your escape.

turns.narrative: The Broodmother is a towering mass of chitin and acid. She spits a massive glob of digestive fluid at your team.
turns.choice_a: Throw up a magical shield to protest the team
turns.consequence_a: The shield holds. Everyone survives the initial volley.
turns.choice_b: Dodge the acid and let the team fend for themselves
turns.consequence_b: You avoid damage entirely, but two of your best Wardens melt into puddles.

mother_killed_clean.description: You purged the pits and kept your squad alive.

mother_killed_messy.description: You killed the Broodmother, but the Strike Team suffered heavy losses.

conclusion: You purged the pits and kept your squad alive.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
